channel.title: Where should I start?
channel.description:
Hey guys I am just getting started and I was wondering what server and client I should start with. I want to be able to edit both server + client. My main goal is to make it the way I want it and just have me and my friends play together. (Just a small project for fun) I would like to start on a [317] if possible and I'm not sure if this matters but I like the layout of the moparscape client, I like how you can have buttons for forums and things along the top.
Thanks you in advance.

item.title: Where should I start?
item.dc:creator: @Continue Continue
item.description:
@Continue wrote:

Start out with a server which you like; which has your needs. Client sided, if you are knew, I’d start out with Galkon’s Refactored Base; easy to use. The coding in it is refactored, hence the name, meaning it’s been renamed so that people can understand it. Instead of a method being called “method18()”, you would have something like “drawChatArea()”. Which one is easier to read? Go with a refactored base, you’ll learn quickly and you’ll experience a lot.

Read full topic

item.title: Where should I start?
item.dc:creator: @sjoukjeowns sjoukjeowns
item.description:
@sjoukjeowns wrote:

Alot of client’s are better looking the the moparscape one and have cool menu features above (ipchanger’s always have too)

Read full topic

item.title: Where should I start?
item.dc:creator: @Motokid126 Motokid126
item.description:
@Motokid126 wrote:

Just do what the guy above said. The best thing to do is go through and find one you like…Server+Client. Look for things that you want in it that you might not want to add yourself like D-Claws gs stances etc. Thats what i did and i found a pretty good base =)

Good Luck

Read full topic

item.title: Where should I start?
item.dc:creator: @Coldkill Coldkill
item.description:
@Coldkill wrote:

zrickz:

Correct me if I’m wrong but don’t they have to be open sourced to be edited? not quite sure, but I’m pretty sure some people block you from changing stuff. thanks

no they don’t have to be open…because u can decompile .class files

and there are hundreds of servers+clients…just go to the server download section and pick 1 out (317 would be the best for a starter)

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,423331.0.html <<< all you need…its all there if you just search for it (found it in 2 mins)

use your handy tool “google”

Read full topic

item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

there are loads of clients + servers in the download section, i can’t really recommend something because you should just choose whatever you find most to your liking.
